alert.note: Alert for Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 5:36PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN NUCKOLLS AND SOUTHERN WEBSTER COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 536 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Red Cloud, or 37 miles south of Hastings, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Red Cloud around 540 PM CDT. Cowles around 550 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
